item.description:
The ultimate killing machine, the most powerful necromantic weapon ever created… After a decade of investigation and iteration, the researchers at Black Sun have been able to develop the Raziel Nk-X, the zenith of all their experiments. With unequaled skills and powers, nothing in the world is able to face this fearsome new model of undead knight.

Neutral Black Sun Warrior Undead Optional Leader - Lv. 60+
 At 5 | Dm 8 | Df 8 | Ar 4 | LP: 20| Re 10 | Mo 6/10 | AP 2/4
 Influence: 2 Uncontrollable: 9+
 Availability: Raziel Nk-X's are not unique, and you may include 1 for every 300 levels available to your Party.
 Unstoppable: A NK-X that reaches 0 LP or less is not eliminated from the game, instead it becomes unstoppable. While in unstoppable state the Nk-X is immune to damage and applies a -2 modifiers to its Attack (however it is still vulnerable to effects and negative states). At the start of each recovery phase roll a die. With a 3+ the Nk-X is removed form the game. If the Nk-X ends the game with 0 LP it counts as a casualty for Victory Points.
 Raxxor Zero: Whenever the Nk-X kills an enemy unit it recovers one LP for each 5 levels the killed unit was worth. For example, a lvl 35 enemy would make the Nk-X recover 7 LP. This ability allows the NK-X to leave the unstoppable state.
 Dead Eyes: The Razael Nk-X gets +1 to Seek rolls.
 o - Exterminator Claw (Ki, Attack)
 -4 Damage. This Attack can only be used after the Raziel Nk-X resolves a successful Basic Attack or Basic Charge. This Attack is not affected by the Raxxor Zero ability.
 ooo - Nova (Magic, Attack)
 This Attack effects all units within 2 inches of the Raziel Nk-X.
 
RAZIEL NK-X Modifications
 A Raziel Nk-X may be given up to two of the following upgrades, increasing their base Level by the amount noted.
 •Dual Raxxors Level: +5
 The Raziel Nk-X's Exterminator Claw no longer suffers -4 damage, and benefits from the Raxxor Zero Ability.
 •Indestructable Level: +5
 The Raziel Nk-X gains +10 Life Points, +1 Armor, and the Damage Resistance rule.
 •Spectral Body Level: +10
 At the End of each Maintenance Phase roll a die. On a 6+ the Raziel Nk-X is intangible until the end of the turn.
 CROSSRAIKER
 A Raziel NK-X can be upgraded to a Crossraiker, choosing one of the options below. Additionally this gives the Raziel-NkX +5 Levels, makes it a Leader, and removes the Uncontrollable ability from them.
 Anubis: Anubis is a Controller and has 2 Guidance points.
 Thanatos: Thanatos Attack is increased to 6 and it gains Critical Mastery.
 Pluto:Pluto recoverys one additional Action Point per turn. If Pluto's attacks deal damage, the target suffers Blind Lvl 2 Effect 15.
 Osiris: While Osiris is Unstoppable it doesn't apply the -2 Attack modifier and is only removed from the game on a roll of 5+ at the beginning of the Upkeep Phase.
 Hermes: Hermes gains the Initiative ability, and its speed is increased to 12/16.
